tool.name: Pfam scan
tool.description: search a FASTA sequence against a library of Pfam HMM
tool.command: mkdir -p './pfam_files' && ln -s '${pfam_library}' './pfam_files/Pfam-A.hmm' && ln -s '${pfam_data}' './pfam_files/Pfam-A.hmm.dat' && #if $active_sites.selector == 'true' ln -s '${active_sites.active_file}' './pfam_files/active_site.dat' && #end if hmmpress './pfam_files/Pfam-A.hmm' && pfam_scan.pl -cpu \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} -fasta '${fasta}' -dir './pfam_files/' -outfile './output.tab' #if $advanced_options.e_seq -e_seq $advanced_options.e_seq #end if #if $advanced_options.e_dom -e_dom $advanced_options.e_dom #end if #if $advanced_options.b_seq -b_seq $advanced_options.b_seq #end if #if $advanced_options.b_dom -b_dom $advanced_options.b_dom #end if #if $active_sites.selector == 'true' -as #end if && tail -n +28 "./output.tab" > "./output_fixed.tab"

param.name: pfam_library
param.label: Pfam-A HMM library
param.help: Pfam-A HMMs in an HMM library searchable with the hmmscan program.

param.name: pfam_data
param.label: Pfam-A HMM Stockholm file
param.help: Stockholm format is a multiple sequence alignment format used by Pfam, Rfam and Dfam, to disseminate protein, RNA and DNA sequence alignments.

param.name: selector
param.label: Predict active site residues
param.help: Predict active site residues for Pfam-A matches

param.name: active_file
param.label: Active sites file
param.help: This file is required for predicting the active site residues.

param.label: Hmmscan evalue sequence cutoff
param.help: Specify hmmscan evalue sequence cutoff for Pfam-A searches (default Pfam defined)

param.label: Hmmscan evalue domain cutoff
param.help: Specify hmmscan evalue domain cutoff for Pfam-A searches (default Pfam defined)

param.label: Hmmscan bit score sequence cutoff
param.help: Specify hmmscan bit score sequence cutoff for Pfam-A searches (default Pfam defined)

param.label: Hmmscan bit score domain cutoff
param.help: Specify hmmscan bit score domain cutoff for Pfam-A searches (default Pfam defined)

param.label: Clan overlap
param.help: Show overlapping hits within clan member families (applies to Pfam-A families only)

param.label: Show alignment
param.help: Show the HMM-sequence alignment for each match

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Purpose**
Search one or more sequences for matching Pfam domains. Depending on the user options, the script can also process the results such that overlaps between families belonging to the same clan are resolved and can predict active sites.
----
.. class:: infomark
**Required files**
To run pfam_scan you will need to download the following files from the Pfam ftp site:
- Pfam-A HMMs in an HMM library searchable with the hmmscan program: `Pfam-A.hmm.gz <https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/Pfam/current_release/Pfam-A.hmm.gz>`_ - Pfam-A HMM Stockholm file associated with each HMM required for pfam_scan: `Pfam-A.hmm.dat.gz <https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/Pfam/current_release/Pfam-A.hmm.dat.gz>`_ - Active sites: `active_sites.dat.gz <ftp://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/Pfam/current_release/active_site.dat.gz>`_
